questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Street markings on pavement
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) Utility markings on pavement
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A street sign
C) Painted markings on the pavement
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A car
C) Red painted letters and an arrow
D) An animal

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A lake
C) More pavement
D) A house

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Grass
B) A bench
C) A tree
D) A river

What is the relationship between the elements in the photo?
A) The tree is next to the bench
B) The red markings are on the pavement next to the grass
C) The car is parked beside the house
D) The flowers are in the vase

What color are the markings on the pavement?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red
D) Yellow

What does the arrow in the photo point towards?
A) A tree
B) A building
C) Upwards
D) Downwards

What type of surface is depicted in the photo?
A) Wooden floor
B) Pavement
C) Sand
D) Water

What is the texture of the surface in the photo?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Slippery
D) Wet

What is the color of the grass in the photo?
A) Brown
B) Yellow
C) Green
D) Red

What is the condition of the pavement in the photo?
A) New and clean
B) Old and worn
C) Wet and slippery
D) Covered in leaves

What is the shape of the arrow in the photo?
A) Circular
B) Square
C) Triangular
D) Rectangular

What is the orientation of the arrow in the photo?
A) Pointing left
B) Pointing right
C) Pointing up
D) Pointing down

What is the likely location of the photo?
A) In a rural area
B) In an urban setting
C) In a forest
D) On a beach

What is the dominant color in the photo?
A) Silver
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow

What is the secondary color in the photo?
A) White
B) Black
C) Brown
D) Red

What other markings are present in the photo besides red?
A) Yellow markings
B) Blue markings
C) Green markings
D) White markings

What is the size of the red markings in the photo?
A) Small
B) Medium
C) Large
D) Extra-large

What is the state of the grass in the photo?
A) Dry and brown
B) Lush and green
C) Covered in flowers
D) Wet and muddy

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Aerial view
B) Side view
C) Close-up view
D) Distant view

What is the condition of the pavement in terms of wear and tear?
A) Pristine
B) Slightly worn
C) Heavily worn
D) Recently repaired

What is the primary texture of the grass in the photo?
A) Coarse
B) Fine
C) Rough
D) Smooth

What is the likely environment around the photo?
A) Urban
B) Suburban
C) Rural
D) Industrial

What is the likely purpose of the arrow in the red markings?
A) To indicate direction
B) To mark a location
C) To show a boundary
D) To highlight a feature

What is the orientation of the letters in the red markings?
A) Horizontal
B) Vertical
C) Diagonal
D) Circular

What is the likely reason for the presence of grass in the photo?
A) It is part of a lawn
B) It is growing wild
C) It is part of a garden
D) It is decorative

What color is the graffiti in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Red
C) Yellow
D) Green

What direction does the arrow in the graffiti point?
A) Down
B) Up
C) Left
D) Right
